modName: Emily The Silent Avenger Preset for ECE and RACEMENU
summary: The original preset of Emily, the silent avenger.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3CothGNl.jpg[/img]

Want to play Skyrim as a beautiful blonde girl?
Download my legit and free preset! :D
Don't go to some ugly wix website and waste your money on buying my stolen work for $5.
This is the one I used to create one of my follower mods, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60786/?]Emily, The silent Avenger[/url].


Here are recommended mods that will make her look even hotter :3 
(mods used in screenshots are marked with *)


[b][size=3]Character[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu*[/url]

[b][size=3]Body[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]Sevenbase*[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url]

[b][size=3]Skin[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion*[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?]Porcelain pale Vampire Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]Pure Skin[/url]
[size=3]
[b]Hair[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT Physics*[/url]

[b][size=3]Cosmetics[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76089/?]YevMods[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty*[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?]Maevan2's Eye Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female EyeBrows*[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?]HN66 Long Eye Lashes[/url][/center][center][b]
[size=3]Miscellaneous[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation [/url][/center]
[center][/center][center]Feel free to upload your pics![/center]
author: VinAri0807
